job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: strongWho We Are brbrstrongFounded by veteran business executive Noosheen Hashemi and Director of Genomics and Personalized Medicine at Stanford University Dr Michael Snyder  and backed by Silicon Valley luminaries Jerry Yang Marc Benioff and Steve Chen  January AI is the first precision health company that combines heart rate and continuous glucose monitors sleep and activity tracking and seamless meal logging including inferred calorie and fiber consumption drawing from a proprietary atlas of 16m foods to give you a complete picture of your metabolic wellbeing and nudge you towards better habits in just 30 daysfrom predicting which foods you should eat and avoid to when a brisk walk or overnight fast can bring your blood sugar back into a healthy rangebrbrCheck out our recent coverage in STAT TechCrunch New York Times and VentureBeatbrbrAt January AI we believe that every day is January 1st that every day is a fresh start We believe that health isnt a place you reach but the simple process of doing just a little better than yesterday We believe that selfimprovement is a team sport Thats why January AI is creating a community of everyday people building their healthy habits together January AI is backed among others by Marc Benioff Jerry Yang and Steve Chen founders of Salesforce Yahoo and YouTube If youre ready to join our team and help grow this community please submit your application following the link providedbrbrPosition OverviewbrbrWe are looking for an experienced machine learning ML engineer with practical experience utilizing deep learning methods and tools As part of the machine learning team at January AI you would be working on various AI initiatives including investigating and implementing models and algorithms to predict biomedical and behavioral quantities from unstructured biomedical and user generated data and work closely with the engineering team to release ML features based on your models to the January AI platform You would collaborate with the product team to influence future roadmaps for MLdriven features on the January AI platform and would apply your ML expertise to develop models that improve our existing MLdriven productsbrbrstrong Roles And Responsibilities brstrongulliDesign and implement models using Deep Learning and other machine learning algorithms and techniquesliliLeverage deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques to enhance the existing app featuresliliDevelop prototypes for new featuresservices and deliver reliable machine learning features for deploymentliliManipulate and analyze complex highvolume high dimensionality data from multiple sourcesliliDeliver endtoend scalable performant and reliable machine learning features in productionbrbrliulstrong Required Qualifications brstrongulliAdvanced degree MS PhD in computer science electrical and computer engineering or other fields related to machine learning lili2 years of industry experience or equivalent research experienceliliProlific experience writing deep learning and other machine learning algorithms and workflows in pythonliliDeep theoretical and practical experience with a number of ML techniques and frameworks such as deep neural networks RNN CNN AE GAN Transformers etcliliProficiency at coding and debugging workflows written using deep Learning frameworks such as PyTorch Keras andor TensorFlowliliPractical experience with software engineering practices eg unit testing code reviews design documentationliliBe driven to deliver impactful consumerfocused solutionsliulNice to havebrulliPrior working experience with healthcare wearable device andor human subject dataliliPrevious work implementing recommender systems in a productbrliulWed love to hear from youbrbrJanuary is an equal opportunity employerbrbrWe are a diverse team and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employeesbrbrOur HQ office is located in sunny and beautiful downtown Menlo Park CA walking distance to Caltrain and local cafes and restaurantsbrbrLocal or West coastbased candidates preferredbrbrBenefits and Perks of working Fulltime at January include Competitive salary and equity packages 401k with corporate matching Health dental vision life and ADampD insurance Commuter benefitsbrbrWe do not accept thirdparty solicitation for employment
